definition: that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams

sentences.english: That good for nothing never sends any money to his poor mother.
sentences.chinese: 那个没用的家伙，从不给他可怜的母亲送钱。

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 过去的那个休赛期，有很多关于科比想被交易的报道。

sentences.english: This feels like the perfect place for me right now.
sentences.chinese: 这种感觉就像那个完美的地方对我一样。

sentences.english: The salesperson said it was a famous world brand.
sentences.chinese: 那个售货员说是世界名牌呢。

sentences.english: Or onto the person next to you?
Her inner male counterpart wrote the book on celebrating the body beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她内心对应的那个男性意向对展现外在美很在行。

sentences.english: I commanded the voice before terror could incapacitate me.
sentences.chinese: 我赶在恐惧击倒我以前对那个声音下令。

sentences.english: But he must not espouse the old lady needlessly.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他不能毫无必要地娶那个老女人。

sentences.english: Back to the room to sleep, you may have seen her with the quilt, the mother.
sentences.chinese: 回房睡觉，也许你已见她加上的被子，那个是母亲。

sentences.english: The thief had run more than forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 那个小偷已经跑了四十多里路。

sentences.english: The image of the woman popped into his head out of the blue.
sentences.chinese: 那个女人的形象突然出现在他的脑海里。

sentences.english: In the tale of the Pied Piper, we have a village overrun with rats.
sentences.chinese: 魔笛的故事里，那个村庄鼠患泛滥。

sentences.english: I’m the one who put the ads there.
sentences.chinese: 我正是那个把广告放在那里的人。

sentences.english: Let's go to the megastar's singing performance, shall we?
sentences.chinese: 我们去听那个天王巨星的演唱会，好吗？
她还跟那个异教徒一起么？

sentences.english: I think we should go into the cave.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我们还是回到那个山洞。

definition: that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
lit. that person/fig. the person you have been looking for/Mr Right/the girl of one's dreams
that/that kind of/that sort of/that type of
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您[nin2])
